[CDF-24990] ðŸ˜µ Location filename must be unique (#1639)

# Description

## Problem
Locations filter filenames must be unique across modules

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/72e4d144-0764-4843-a5c3-7a9b9b29786d)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Fixed

- Location filter filenames must no longer be unique across modules.
This bug was introduced in `0.5.24`.

## templates

No changes.
